scripts.start: echo ⛔️ This package is a set of dependencies and cannot be executed by itself
scripts.build: clear && echo ⌛️ Compiling code... && tsc && echo ✅ Build completed successfully!
scripts.release:patch: rm -rf ./package-lock.json && rm -rf ./node_modules && rm -rf dist && npm i && npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: rm -rf ./package-lock.json && rm -rf ./node_modules && rm -rf dist && npm i && npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.release:major: rm -rf ./package-lock.json && rm -rf ./node_modules && rm -rf dist && npm i && npm run build && npm version major && npm publish
